verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֑ת <WH5058> [Tbin-gi-Not;on Neginoth מִזְמ֖וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> le-'a-Saf of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> Shir. [or] Song נוֹדָ֣ע <WH3045> no-Da' known בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> bi-hu-Dah In Judah אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; [is] God בְּ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] great שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> she-Mo. his name

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi is in בְשָׁלֵ֣ם <WH8004> ve-sha-Lem In Salem סֻכּ֑וֹ <WH5520> suk-Ko; also is his tabernacle וּמְע֖וֹנָת֣וֹ <WH4585> u-me-'o-na-To and his dwelling place בְצִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> ve-tzi-Yon. in Zion

שָׁ֭מָּה <WH8033> mah There שִׁבַּ֣ר <WH7665> shib-Bar There brake רִשְׁפֵי־ <WH7565> rish-fei- he the arrows קָ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> Ka-shet; of the bow מָגֵ֬ן <WH4043> ma-Gen the shield וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ve-Che-rev and the sword וּמִלְחָמָ֣ה <WH4421> u-mil-cha-Mah and the battle סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

נָ֭אוֹר <WH215> Na-'or Thou [art] more glorious אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you אַדִּ֗יר <WH117> 'ad-Dir, [and] excellent מֵֽהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> me-har-rei- than the mountains טָֽרֶף׃ <WH2964> Ta-ref. of prey

אֶשְׁתּוֹלְל֨וּ׀ <WH7997> 'esh-tol-Lu are spoiled אַבִּ֣ירֵי <WH47> 'ab-Bi-rei strong לֵ֭ב <WH3820> lev care for נָמ֣וּ <WH5123> na-Mu they have slept שְׁנָתָ֑ם <WH8142> she-na-Tam; their sleep וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- could מָצְא֖וּ <WH4672> ma-tze-'U have found כָל־ <WH3605> chol and none אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> 'an-shei- and none of the men חַ֣יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil of might יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem. their hands

מִ֭גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ <WH1606> mig-ga-'a-Ra-te-cha At thy rebuke אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei O God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko; of Jacob נִ֝רְדָּ֗ם <WH7290> nir-Dam, are cast into a dead sleep וְרֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> ve-Re-chev both the chariot וָסֽוּס׃ <WH5483> va-Sus. and horse

אַתָּ֤ה׀ <WH859> 'at-Tah You נ֥וֹרָא <WH3372> No-ra Thou [even] thou [art] to be feared אַ֗תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah, you וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> u-mi- and who יַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> ya-'a-Mod and who may stand לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha, in thy sight מֵאָ֥ז <WH227> me-'Az when אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> 'ap-Pe-cha. anger

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> Mish-sha-ma-yim from heaven הִשְׁמַ֣עְתָּ <WH8085> hish-Ma'-ta to be heard דִּ֑ין <WH1779> Din; Thou didst cause judgment אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the earth יָֽרְאָ֣ה <WH3372> ya-re-'Ah feared וְשָׁקָֽטָה׃ <WH8252> ve-sha-Ka-tah. and was still

בְּקוּם־ <WH6965> be-kum- arose לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> lam-mish-Pat to judgment אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; When God לְהוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <WH3467> le-ho-Shi-a' to save כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עַנְוֵי־ <WH6035> 'an-vei- all the meek אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For חֲמַ֣ת <WH2534> cha-Mat Surely the wrath אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man תּוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <WH3034> to-De-ka; shall praise שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit thee the remainder חֵמֹ֣ת <WH2534> che-Mot of wrath תַּחְגֹּֽר׃ <WH2296> tach-Gor. shalt thou restrain

נִֽדֲר֣וּ <WH5087> ni-da-Ru Vow וְשַׁלְּמוּ֮ <WH7999> ve-shal-le-Mu and pay לַיהוָ֪ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱ‍ ֽלֹהֵ֫יכֶ֥ם <WH430> 'elo-Hei-Chem your God כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all סְבִיבָ֑יו <WH5439> se-vi-Vav; let all that be round about יוֹבִ֥ילוּ <WH2986> yo-Vi-lu him bring שַׁ֝֗י <WH7862> shai presents לַמּוֹרָֽא׃ <WH4172> lam-mo-Ra. unto him that ought to be feared

יִ֭בְצֹר <WH1219> Yiv-tzor He shall cut off ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach the spirit נְגִידִ֑ים <WH5057> ne-gi-Dim; of princes נ֝וֹרָ֗א <WH3372> no-Ra, [he is] terrible לְמַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> le-mal-chei- to the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth
